paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Menopon gallinae ( Linnaeus, 1758 )
;
Price et al. 2003: 126
.

Menopon gallinae ( Linnaeus, 1758 )
;
González-Acuña et al. 2009: 182
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Chilean host:
Gallus gallus domesticus Brisson, 1760
.
Chilean localities: Concepción : Region VIII; Valdivia: Region XIV; Chillán: Region XVI.
Geographic distribution: All continents, except Antarctica .

Remarks:
Menopon gallinae
was introduced to Chile by human agency and other countries with chickens.Concepción is a new locality record for
Menopon gallinae
in Chile , based on a sample from
Gallus gallus domesticus
held in MONZ .

Myrsidea Waterston, 1915
. Entomol. Month. Mag. 51, 12. Type species:
Myrsidea victrix Waterston, 1915
(by original designation).
